Translations.Text: By the heaven and the herald
And do you know what the herald is
The piercing star
Every soul has a recorder over it
Solet man see from what he was created
Hewas created from a water that spurts forth
Itcomes out from between the spine and the testicles
For He is able to bring him back
The Day when all is revealed
Then he will not have any power or victor
Andthe sky which gives rain
Andthe land with cracks
This is the word that separates matters
Andit is not a thing for amusement
They are planning a plan
AndI am planning a plan
So respite the rejecters, respite them for a while
Glorify the name of your Lord, the Most High
The One who has created and developed
And the One who measured and then guided
And the One who brought out the pasture
SoHe made it dry-up into hay
We will let you read, so do not forget
Except for what God wills, He knows what is declared and what is hidden
And We will make easy for you the way
Soremind, perhaps the reminder will help
He who is concerned will remember
Andhe who is wicked will avoid it
He will enter the great Fire
Then he will neither die in it nor live
Whoever purifies will succeed
Andremembers the name of his Lord, so he makes the contact
